vlan_array_info: define each vlan per separate entry, if no vlan; empty array

ae_solution_value.intX_array_info: Interface for AE | example: array('1/9','1/10') => ethernet1/9 and ethernet1/10
ae_solution_value.ae_array_info: AE must be two: | example: array('5','6') => ae5 and ae6

none_ae_solution_value.intX_array_info: Interfaces for vwire | example: array('1/4','1/4') => ethernet1/3 and ethernet1/4
none_ae_solution_value.int2_array_info: for none ae solution this information is not relevant
none_ae_solution_value.ae_array_info: for none ae solution: 0 is default vwire - DO NOT CHANGE
